description: Cooler days call for hearty meals - and this recipe is just the ticket. What could be more comforting than a savoury mince pie with crusty garlic bread?
keywords: Savoury Mince Pie With Garlic Bread Topping
name: Savoury Mince Pie With Garlic Bread Topping Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place pan on centre shelf and grill for 5 minutes or until bread is heated through and golden. Stand for 5 minutes, then serve sprinkled with parsley.
